transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed
WAITING

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, not that that's doin' anything for my bank account, but... (clears his throat)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Figures.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (off camera) Zorak? Moltar? (walks on camera, wearing only his cowl and power bands) Let me tell you the story of the birds and the bees.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Wow.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, don't be like that. It's beautiful.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, universe and beyond. I'm comedian Todd Barry. On tonight's show: Space Ghost! Now say hello to Zorak and the Original Way-Outs.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, let me ask you something. How come you never introduce me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do what now?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: At the beginning of each show, you introduce yourself, you introduce Zorak, I just thought it would be nice, one time, if you introduced me too.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs, putting his hand in front of his face)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What's so funny?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, Moltar, Moltar. You're only the director. No one sees or cares about you. Zorak and I are the talent. (Zorak sips from his mug)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I thought you hated Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I do hate you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey Space Ghost! Wanna hear a funny joke?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: See, Moltar, this is what I'm talking about.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (disgusted sigh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Quiet, Moltar, your heat will throw off his timing, and that's why you suck.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (another disgusted sigh)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Alright, here we go. Er, uh, um... Knock knock?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Um, who's there?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (beat) (BLEEP) you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (beat) (Laughs) Well done, Zorak. So anyway, Moltar, I'm always open to ideas which might make the show better.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How about I come out at the beginning of every show and hit you upside the head with a hammer?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'd watch that show.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And light your teeth on fire and puncture your eardrums with golf tees until your spinal fluid leaks out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Moltar, but...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Can I do the hammer part? You can do the lighting his teeth on fire part.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, I do the hammer.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I do the hammer!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) You ALWAYS do the hammer!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) I'm the hammer! Me! Zorak is the hammer! Zorak is the hammer! (starts to spaz out)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alright, it's settled. Zorak is the hammer, Moltar, you suck.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (disgusted sigh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, get off your metal ass and bring in my first guest...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ... but not right now. (monitor stops, halfway down) Hmmm. (Space Ghost ducks behind desk, making rustling noises)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Where'd he go?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (more rustling noises) Moltar, the louder, the funnier.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (disgusted) What?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Just do it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (more rustling and crackling noises) (hums to himself) I'm mumbling...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What an ass.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (more rustling and mumbling)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (looks on; glances at camera momentarily)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (reads a book while Space Ghost rustles and mumbles yet some more)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Turn it off, Moltar, there's nothing in it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Turning off in 20 (throws his lever) 19 .. 18 .. 17 .. 16 .. 15 (Space Ghost starts tapping his blue card each time Moltar counts) .. 14 .. 13 .. 12 .. 11 .. 10 .. 9 .. 8 .. 7 (Space Ghost taps his card twice, throwing off Moltar's counting) 6 .. 5'er (Space Ghost starts tapping faster) .. 4 .. 3 .. 2 .. 1 .. 0 (Throws his lever again: screen goes white, then returns) (Laughs) Alright, uh, let's see. (Throws his lever again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (taps his card) I can't believe you said "ass", Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, you're an ass.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Mercy!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares angrily)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Love that line. Love that line. Now, what are we doing?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws his lever, the control room monitor changes from Space Ghost to a test pattern, then to Todd Barry) Uh, I've got Todd Barry.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh. (Looks at his blue card) Who's this guy, I've ne-.  I've never seen him. Has he been on Russell Simmons?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh... I don't know.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eh... Why don't we get him on the show? Screw Todd Barry. (Monitor lowers with Todd on the screen) We sure we need this guy?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Quit lookin' at me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've never even heard of this guy.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Um...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Todd! Good to see ya!

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Thank you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (beat) (looks at his card) It says here you've got a car.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Maybe I do, maybe I don't.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you do. And it's nice. (whispers to camera) I washed it!

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Oh, gosh, thank you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank YOU.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, tell me about your private life.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I wanna, I wanna find out personal details.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: I don't know.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Answer me!

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I don't even know what I just said.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I wanna call you later at home, you'll have to give me your home number, because I'm gonna ask you how much they're paying you. (Crow hops onto Space Ghost's shoulder)

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: A hundred ninety.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're kidding me. (Crow hops back onto Space Ghost's head) That's weird.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry, I didn't hear you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh, he said, "Screw you, you ass." (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Yeah, you're an ass!

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: How'd you know my middle name?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ah yes. (Crow caws; Space Ghost caws back; crow caws back) Todd, this crow is trying to tell us something.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Is that the space cops comin'?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, it's something about your car. (Runs over to crow, caws at it, the crow caws back) It's in danger.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Are you serious?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Crows aren't interested in you, they like cars.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Hey, who doesn't?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shh! Hey, this is important. (The crow and Space Ghost caw back and forth at each other for a while) Hmm, I better check on your car. (flies off the set)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, baldy! (throws a bottle at the monitor; it breaks on impact)

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Heckling's uncool. (another bottle breaks on the monitor) Do you want people heckling you, while you're playing your keyboard.. guitar?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, that crow was full of (BLEEP), this car's perfectly safe. Hey! A grocery store. (walks off camera)

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: THat's not very funny. (Zorak throws another bottle) I'm very tired, Moltar, Zolar, you know what I'm talking about. (Zorak throws another bottle) Zofar, you know what I'm talking about.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get your ass over here! (Dramatic music plays, Zorak fires his rifle at the crow, who makes a backward flip, and fires laser blasts back at Zorak) Now! (fires at the crow, who hops behind Space Ghost's desk, then pops up and blasts Zorak again. The cross fire continues)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hell, even at the comic shop here in town, like the Moltar action figure is marked down fifty percent.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's the only one.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: That's more of this exposure thing you were asking me about?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, they want, like, thirteen bucks for it, so I guess they're selling it for, like, six-fifty or something.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Nah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Sad.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Right here, buddy. (Shoots at the crow; the crow flies at Zorak, knocking him down; it then starts pecking at his eyes)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I don't know, the Zorak one is fourteen ninety-five, so...

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Ah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I mean, they didn't even price Moltars. (Set rocks from an explosion) I mean, they're all supposed to be priced the same.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Do you have some food for me?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stops chewing) Hmm? Uh uh. (continues eating the crow)

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Hey, come on.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I, I never shut my refrigerator door. I just ... (looks at Zorak) Oooh, gimme some of that!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stops chewing) Hmmm? Nah.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: What food are you gonna get? Can you get Thai food? I really like Thai food.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, Moltar: huddle up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This guy's obviously hungry, but we shouldn't have to share our food. Zorak, you tell him. You'll make it funny. On two. Ready? Break! (Zorak says nothing) Ready... Break! Ready...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, funny man! Got a joke for ya.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: What would that be, I'm afraid to hear this one.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You're not getting any of our (BLEEP)ing crow.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, thanks for coming on.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: That's it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yup.

transcript.speaker: Todd Barry
transcript.dialogue: Come on.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How about a big hand for the hungry comedian? (Space Ghost blasts the monitor; Todd Barry is replaced by a giant eye.) Isn't he great? Aw, hell. Damn it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The bees; I forgot to tell the bees! (flies off the set)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, bees. I am looking forward to it. Oh, that's very kind of you, bees. Dicky said I could. What do you mean? I did too pay you back! Look, Jack, that is such BS. What do you want from me?!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's got low mileage, and it does pull to the right.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (off camera) Okay then.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And so, that's the story of the birds and the bees.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So, that car crash was a metaphor for when the male sperm hits the ovum?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What? No, bees steal cars.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, so the crow that shot lasers at Zorak - that was the metaphoric sperm.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Metaslarphic... Crows shoot lasers! Pay attention! (Beat)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Why don't you put your clothes back on?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Never!
